msg: Separate out httpclient patches into two: a cumulative post-3.1 patch, and an mcf-specific patch.

msg: Added new download URL for 11.2 playerglobal.swc. Changed flextasks path to be lib directory which current modules build script targets.

author: brett
msg: reverse the order of searching for the Windows SDK, as on x86_64 systems it puts
all the executables in c:\Program Files, but still creates c:\Program Files
(x86) version without any of the binaries
